reviews.text:
Great option especially if you like mala flavored spicy food! 

The fried chicken or fish with hot pepper is a must if you like that crunchy fried texture...
While I'm not much of a spicy fan, two of my friends love the heat, so I suggested we meet at ChiliSpot for lunch. Our service was quick and both ladies...
Food was very fresh and delicious. Unfortunately or fortunately I do react on msg in various unpredictable ways so can't come back because it's definitely...
